settings.heading: XIAOMI x LEICA Co-engineered Summicron Lens
settings.subheading: To seek the masterpiece, we join hands with Leica, crafting authentic Leica look and capturing the authentic feelings with the technology in the lens.

settings.heading: The Leica professional camera system is a great leap in imaging capabilities
settings.subheading:
Leica main camera - Leica professional optical lens
50MP | 24mm equivalent focal length | f/1.9 aperture | OIS

Leica telephoto camera
50MP | 50mm equivalent focal length | f/1.9 aperture

Leica ultra-wide camera
12MP | 15mm equivalent focal length | f/2.2 aperture

Pro video station
8K video recording and 10-bit Log video recording

settings.heading: Leica professional optical lens
settings.subheading:
Carefully tuned for more purity

Inheriting Leica's professional quality, the optical quality of the lens has been adjusted and improved at the source, bringing richer colors, ultra-high resolution, effectively solving ghosting and glare, and producing excellent rendering even in extreme environments.

settings.heading: The first Xiaomi BioComfort vegan leather
settings.subheading:
More environmentally friendly

All-new technology composite PU which is dirt resistant and durable, with excellent cold resistance and breathability. It is more naturally skin-friendly and feels extremely comfortable.

*Only Alpine blue comes with Xiaomi BioComfort vegan leather.

settings.heading: CrystalRes display
settings.subheading:
The New Custom FlagshipAMOLED

6.67" Dotdisplay

A brand new customized flagship AMOLED with amazingly upgraded performance and 2600nits peak brightness*, it still performs clearly in the sun and brings you a better creative experience.

settings.heading: Exquisite design
settings.subheading:
Enticing colors

A straight screen design combined with imitation anodic spray achieves a metallic texture with a more refined feel. The DECO section adopts a watch-level one-blade drilling and cutting process. The metal is polished to a high-gloss for a more flagship texture.more flagship texture.

settings.heading: Wi-Fi 7 capability*
settings.subheading:
Fast startup

Supports DBS and MLO, dual-band concurrent Wi-Fi with a theoretical peak speed rate of 6.5Gbps*. Immediately feel the effects of earthshattering fast Wi-Fi.

*Wi-Fi 7/Wi-Fi 6E/Wi-Fi 6 capability may vary based on regional availability and local network support. Wi-Fi connectivity (including Wi-Fi frequency bands, Wi-Fi standards and other features as ratified in IEEE Standard 802.11 specifications) may vary based on regional availability and local network support. The function may be added via OTA when and where applicable. The device needs to be connected to network devices, such as routers, that support Wi-Fi 7 to use this function.

settings.heading: Experience Masterpiece Battery and Charging
settings.subheading:
120W HyperCharge
5000mAh large battery
120W HyperCharge
19 mins Charge to 100% (Boost mode)
